question: [Focus] Polski: Podaj which integer bin occurs most frequently na podstawie histogramu.

qas.question: [Focus] Polski: Podaj which integer bin occurs most frequently na podstawie histogramu.
[Explain] Nederlands: Meld how many samples were used in total vanuit het histogram.
[Calm] Norsk: Oppgi how many entries fall inside the modal bin basert pa histogrammet.
